live_updates: Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
63347.summary: Some customers in the Tyndall Park area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63347.title: June 30 - Winnipeg (Tyndall Park) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Technicians continue to wait for the local power company to complete their repairs. Once power is back online our technicians will resume restoring services.
Power has been restored, and services are back online for most customers. Technicians continue to restore services for a few remaining areas.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
63331.summary: Some customers in the Riverbend area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
63331.title: June 29 - Calgary (Riverbend) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)
